channel.title: Joat's Hobby Apps
channel.description: Recent content on Joat's Hobby Apps

item.title: App Privacy Policy
item.description: No Personal Data I do not collect any personal data. Any data entered by you into the app remains on your device. It is not sent to me or any third party. My apps contain no ads. Other Services My apps may use third-party services which may collect data from you outside of my control. Links to the privacy policies of these services are below: Google Play Services Background I write apps as a hobby, just like other people do woodworking or embroidery, and I make them available to others because it is easy to do so.
